item.title: About
item.description: Hi, I’m Rob ðŸ˜„ I work in government at the intersection of data science and active labour market policy. I studied political science and economics. Now I spend a lot of time analyzing data using #rstats and building things on the web. I live in the Canadian north with my partner and this guy: View this post on Instagram Barn yard!
